title: Germany locks down unvaccinated people from participating in parts of public life as COVID vaccine mandate looms
content:
1. Germany locks down unvaccinated people from participating in parts of public life as COVID vaccine mandate looms  KABC-TV
  2. Germany locks down unvaccinated people, as leaders plan to make shots compulsory  CNN
  3. Covid: Germany puts major restrictions on unvaccinated  BBC News
  4. Germany eyes lockdown for unvaccinated as infections rise  The Times of Israel
  5. Germany announces nationwide lockdown for the unvaccinated  CNN
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
contentSnippet:

Covid: Germany puts major restrictions on unvaccinated  BBC News

localize.title: COVIDワクチンの義務化が迫る中、ドイツではワクチン未接種者が公共生活の一部に参加できない状態に。
由于COVID疫苗任务迫在眉睫，德国禁止未接种疫苗的人参与部分公共生活
由於COVID疫苗任務迫在眉睫，德國禁止未接種疫苗的人蔘與部分公共生活
